melting.methodInterfaces

Interface CorrectionMethod

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Ahsen01DMSOCorrection, Ahsen01SodiumCorrection, Blake96FormamideCorrection, Cullen76DMSOCorrection, DNADMSOCorrections, EntropyCorrection, Escara80DMSOCorrection, FormamideLinearMethod, FrankKamenetskii71SodiumCorrection, MarmurSchildkrautDoty98_62SodiumCorrection, Musielski81DMSOCorrection, Owczarzy04SodiumCorrection19, Owczarzy04SodiumCorrection20, Owczarzy04SodiumCorrection21, Owczarzy04SodiumCorrection22, Owczarzy08MagnesiumCorrection, Owczarzy08MixedNaMgCorrection, Santalucia96SodiumCorrection, Santalucia98_04SodiumCorrection, SchildkrautLifson65SodiumCorrection, Tan06MagnesiumCorrection, Tan06SodiumCorrection, Tan07MagnesiumCorrection, Tan07MixedNaMgCorrection, Tan07SodiumCorrection, Wetmur91SodiumCorrection

    public interface CorrectionMethod
    This interface is implemented by classes which contain methods to correct the melting temperature. It can be a temperature correction for ions, formamide, DMSO,...

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ThermoResult correctMeltingResults(Environment environment)
      This method is called to correct the computed melting temperature.
      boolean isApplicable(Environment environment)
      Check if the environment chosen by the user is a applicable with the correction model.

    • Method Detail

      • isApplicable

        boolean isApplicable(Environment environment)
        Check if the environment chosen by the user is a applicable with the correction model.
        Parameters:
        environment -
        Returns:
        false if the correction method can't be used with the Environment. If the environment can make the results less reliable, a warning message will appear.

      • correctMeltingResults

        ThermoResult correctMeltingResults(Environment environment)
        This method is called to correct the computed melting temperature.
        Parameters:
        environment -
        Returns:
        ThermoResult which contains the corrected results (enthalpy, entropy and melting temperature).
